com.defano.jmonet.canvas.layer

Interface LayeredImage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PaintCanvas, ScaledLayeredImage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPaintCanvas, AbstractPaintSurface, ImageLayerSet, JMonetCanvas

    public interface LayeredImage
    An image that is composed of multiple layers rendered one atop another.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImageLayer[] getImageLayers()
      Gets the layers of this image in the order in which they should be drawn.
      default Dimension getSize()
      Calculates the size of this image; equal to the dimensions of the largest layer in the image.
      default void paint(GraphicsContext g, Double scale, Rectangle clip)
      Draws this layered image onto the given graphics context.
      default BufferedImage render()
      Produces a new BufferedImage containing each of the layers of this image rendered atop one another.

    • Method Detail

      • getImageLayers

        ImageLayer[] getImageLayers()
        Gets the layers of this image in the order in which they should be drawn.
        Returns:
        The image layers

      • render

        default BufferedImage render()
        Produces a new BufferedImage containing each of the layers of this image rendered atop one another.
        Returns:
        A rendering of this image.

      • paint

        default void paint(GraphicsContext g,
                   Double scale,
                   Rectangle clip)
        Draws this layered image onto the given graphics context.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context on which to draw
        scale - The scale at which to draw the image
        clip - The clipping rectangle describing the bounds of the graphics context that should be painted

      • getSize

        default Dimension getSize()
        Calculates the size of this image; equal to the dimensions of the largest layer in the image.
        Returns:
        The size of this image.
